item.title: Xapian
item.description: I offer commercial development support for Xapian since 2014. I have developed the following capabilities in Xapian commercially: Decoupled indexing and text extraction, which drastically reducing indexing time. Enabled indexing of images using tesseract. I have designed and implemented a heuristic algorithm to extract table from images. I have implemented the Language Modelling based ranking scheme in Xapian (GSOC). I have developed an evaluation framework for Xapian.

item.title: gdb Demystified
item.description:
gdb is one of the useful commands to debug what’s going wrong with your program.
Let’s try to understand how we can demystify where and what is making your code hang in a running program. Step 1 Check the process id of your program: ps -ef | grep program Step 2 Attach to the stuck process via gdb, when it is in a stuck state gdb -attach pid Step 3 Check the stack trace of the hanging process.
